title: CSE halts trading as shares plunge over 5%
body_lines: Regular trading has been halted at the Colombo Stock Exchange (CSE) for 30 minutes due to the Standard & Poor’s Sri Lanka 20 (S&P SL20) index dropping over 5% from the previous close.
Trading was halted at 10.31 a.m. while the halt will be lifted at 11.01 a.m.
